name: CATAST
description:
This game is a puzzle game in which you destroy blocks with simple controls!
Find a route to destroy many blocks at once and enjoy the exhilaration of destroying them all at once!

Feature

.
  • There are a total of 20 stages with various difficulty levels, so everyone from puzzle action beginners to advanced players can enjoy the game.
  • The stage is cleared when all blocks are destroyed.
  • Special blocks, such as one-way blocks and disappearing blocks, block the player's way.
